targets.query:
from(bucket: "events")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "honeypot_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "attack_intensity")

from(bucket: "events")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "honeypot_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> group(columns: ["event_type"])
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "by_type")

from(bucket: "events")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "honeypot_event")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> group(columns: ["attacker_ip"])
  |> sum()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)
  |> yield(name: "top_ips")
